channel.title: How to change text of tele buttons
channel.description:
hey ppl i have a question how do i change the text on the tele buttons like case 168 most of case 168 are home button but how i change the text from home to train == plz good tut
greeting erwin

item.title: How to change text of tele buttons
item.dc:creator: @adamp40 adamp40
item.description:
@adamp40 wrote:

TextHandler.java

Search for the Tab you wont to Change

Then go into Client.java

Search for case 168: and case 169: ect to find the custom command related to that button
